events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the keywords software engineer and developer in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The candidate completed the initial screening call, discussing their previous experience in software development and devops.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening follow-up email expressing interest in moving forward.
A technical interview with the lead developer has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidate's coding and system design skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the interviewers regarding problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss compensation, benefits, and company culture fit with the candidate.
The candidate completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining the company and its engineering team.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate detailing salary, benefits, and role responsibilities for the software engineer position.
The candidate gave positive feedback on the offer, expressing their excitement and readiness to move forward.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date for onboarding.
The candidate has begun the onboarding process, setting up accounts and completing required training modules for new engineers.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate onboarded and integrated successfully into the engineering team.
